xml:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<root BTCPP_format="4" main_tree_to_execute="MoveForward">
  <BehaviorTree ID="MoveForward">
    <Sequence name="MoveSequence">
      <ComputePathToPose goal="{goal}" path="{path}" planner_id="GridBased"/>
      <FollowPath path="{path}" controller_id="FollowPath"/>
    </Sequence>
  </BehaviorTree>
</root>

<?xml version="1.0"?>
<root BTCPP_format="4" main_tree_to_execute="NavigateToRedBox">
  <BehaviorTree ID="NavigateToRedBox">
    <Sequence name="DetectAndNavigate">
      <DetectObject object_description="red box" target_pose="{box_pose}"/>
      <ComputePathToPose goal="{box_pose}" path="{path}" planner_id="GridBased"/>
      <FollowPath path="{path}" controller_id="FollowPath"/>
    </Sequence>
  </BehaviorTree>
</root>

<?xml version="1.0"?>
<root BTCPP_format="4" main_tree_to_execute="PickRedCup">
  <BehaviorTree ID="PickRedCup">
    <Sequence name="PickSequence">
      <DetectObject object_description="red cup" target_pose="{cup_pose}"/>
      <ComputePathToPose goal="{cup_pose}" path="{path}" planner_id="GridBased"/>
      <FollowPath path="{path}" controller_id="FollowPath"/>
      <PickObject target_pose="{cup_pose}"/>
    </Sequence>
  </BehaviorTree>
</root>

command: Pick up the blue box and place it on the table
xml:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<root BTCPP_format="4" main_tree_to_execute="PickAndPlace">
  <BehaviorTree ID="PickAndPlace">
    <Sequence name="PickAndPlaceSequence">
      <DetectObject object_description="blue box" target_pose="{box_pose}"/>
      <ComputePathToPose goal="{box_pose}" path="{path}" planner_id="GridBased"/>
      <FollowPath path="{path}" controller_id="FollowPath"/>
      <PickObject target_pose="{box_pose}"/>
      <DetectObject object_description="table" target_pose="{table_pose}"/>
      <ComputePathToPose goal="{table_pose}" path="{path}" planner_id="GridBased"/>
      <FollowPath path="{path}" controller_id="FollowPath"/>
      <PlaceObject target_pose="{table_pose}"/>
    </Sequence>
  </BehaviorTree>
</root>

<?xml version="1.0"?>
<root BTCPP_format="4" main_tree_to_execute="MoveBackward">
  <BehaviorTree ID="MoveBackward">
    <BackUp backup_dist="0.5" backup_speed="0.1"/>
  </BehaviorTree>
</root>
